definitions.definition: Having been established as an institution .
examples: It is very difficult to get bureaucracies to abandon their institutionalized practices.

definitions.definition: Having been committed to an institution, such as a prison or an insane asylum .
examples: Once a potential employer learns that you've been institutionalized , you can forget about getting the job.

definitions.definition: Having become dependent after a long time in, and unable to function outside of an institution , especially a prison .

main_definition: Having been established as an institution .
secondary_definitions: Having been committed to an institution, such as a prison or an insane asylum .
( psychology ) Having become dependent after a long time in, and unable to function outside of an institution , especially a prison .
